title: Merck Obtains Exclusive Rights to Market and Distribute MassBiologics' Tetanus-Diphtheria (Td) Vaccine in the U.S.
description: Merck's Adult Vaccine Portfolio Now Includes 9 of the 10 Vaccines on the U.S. CDC's Recommended Adult Immunization Schedule BOSTON & WHITEHOUSE STATION, N.J.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- MassBiologics | Merck's Adult Vaccine Portfolio Now Includes 9 of the 10 Vaccines on the U.S. CDC's Recommended Adult Immunization Schedule BOSTON & WHITEHOUSE STATION, N.J.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- MassBiologics
